name: Fadda Brinebless

equipment.name: Studded Leather Armor
equipment.desc: Made from treated roth√© hide with bone studs.

equipment.name: Loch-Blessed Trident
equipment.desc: A magical trident that glows faintly blue underwater. +1 to attack and damage rolls. Can cast Create or Destroy Water once per day.

equipment.name: Navigator's Compass of the Deep
equipment.desc: Always points toward the nearest safe harbor on the Black Loch. Grants advantage on Survival checks for navigation.

equipment.name: Pouch of Sacred Loch Salt
equipment.desc: Contains enough blessed salt for 10 ritual blessings. Can be used as a spell component.

equipment.name: Bone Dice Set
equipment.desc: Carved from keelhauler bones with eel motifs. Used for gambling and minor divination.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: Fadda can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

traits.name: Loch-Born
traits.desc: Fadda has advantage on Constitution saving throws against cold and exhaustion from aquatic environments. He can hold his breath for up to 15 minutes.

traits.name: Spellcasting (Druid/Cleric Hybrid)
traits.desc:
Fadda is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): Druidcraft, Guidance, Mending, Thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): Create or Destroy Water, Cure Wounds, Detect Magic, Fog Cloud
2nd level (3 slots): Augury, Enhance Ability, Locate Object, Water Walk
3rd level (2 slots): Call Lightning, Water Breathing, Wind Wall

traits.name: Ritual Casting
traits.desc: Fadda can cast spells with the ritual tag as rituals if he has them prepared.

traits.name: Deep Loch Blessing
traits.desc: Once per long rest, Fadda can perform a 10-minute ritual to grant himself and up to 6 allies one of the following benefits for 24 hours: resistance to cold damage, advantage on Constitution saves against exhaustion, or the ability to see clearly underwater to a distance of 60 feet.

traits.name: Loch Whispers
traits.desc: Fadda can sense the general mood and danger level of the Black Loch within 1 mile. He knows if there are hostile creatures, dangerous weather, or magical disturbances in the water.

traits.name: Master Navigator
traits.desc: Fadda never becomes lost on or near the Black Loch. He can determine his exact location and the direction to any known destination on the loch.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Fadda makes two attacks: one with his trident and one cantrip, or two cantrip attacks.

actions.name: Loch-Blessed Trident
actions.desc: Deals additional cold damage when used underwater or in rain. Can be thrown and returns to Fadda's hand.

actions.name: Druidcraft
actions.desc: Fadda can instantly make a flower bloom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom. He can create a harmless sensory effect, predict weather for the next 24 hours, or light/snuff a small flame.

actions.name: Loch's Wrath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Fadda calls upon the Black Loch's power. All creatures within 20 feet must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 3d6 cold damage and are knocked prone by a surge of icy water. On a success, they take half damage and aren't knocked prone.

bonus_actions.name: Blessing of Safe Passage
bonus_actions.desc: Fadda can use a bonus action to bless a creature within 30 feet. The target gains advantage on their next saving throw or ability check related to water, navigation, or survival.

bonus_actions.name: Loch's Guidance
bonus_actions.desc: Fadda casts Guidance as a bonus action, flavored as whispered prayers to the Black Loch.

reactions.name: Deep Current Shield
reactions.desc: When Fadda or an ally within 30 feet takes damage from a ranged attack, he can use his reaction to create a wall of water that grants +2 AC against that attack.

reactions.name: Loch's Warning
reactions.desc: When a creature Fadda can see is about to make a Wisdom (Survival) or Intelligence (Navigation) check, he can use his reaction to grant them advantage on the roll.

personality.speech_pattern: High-pitched pidgin creole mixing Goblin, Undercommon, and invented words
sample_phrases: Deep Black guard da iron worm!
Loch sees all, Loch knows all!
We give respect, Loch gives safe passage.
For da Deep Eye ta watch.
mannerisms: Constantly sprinkling 'blessed' loch water on things
Muttering prayers and blessings under his breath
Tossing small offerings into the water
Reading omens in the movement of water and mist

bio: Fadda Brinebless is a devout goblin shaman who has spent his entire life on the Black Loch. He serves as first mate aboard various vessels, combining practical seamanship with his mystical devotion to the loch itself, which he worships as a living deity. His pidgin speech and constant rituals might seem eccentric, but his supernatural ability to navigate the treacherous waters and predict the loch's moods makes him invaluable to any crew. Despite his superstitious nature, he possesses genuine magical power drawn from his faith in the Deep Black, as he calls his deity.
